General.Name: Laan & Spar Bank AS
General.Description: Lån & Spar Bank A/S provides various banking products and services in Denmark. The company offers deposits; car and housing loans, business loans, and mortgages; and cards. It also provides investment, and pension and insurance services; and payment and online banking services. The company was founded in 1880 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

1.Name: Mr. Jesper  Schiøler
1.Title: Bank Director & Member of Exec. Board
